doc.field: Regional Parcel Dataset - Seven County Twin Cities Metropolitan Area
Regional Parcel Dataset - Seven County Twin Cities Metropolitan Area

This dataset includes those metro counties that have made their parcel data feely available without a license or fees. Additional counties parcel data will be added to this dataset as it becomes available.
This dataset is a compilation of tax parcel polygon and point layers assembled into a common coordinate systems from Twin Cities, Minnesota metropolitan area counties. No attempt has been made to edgematch or rubbersheet between counties. A standard set of attribute fields is included for each county. (See section 5 of the metadata). The attributes are the same for the polygon and points layers. Not all attributes are populated for all counties.
The polygon layer contains one record for each real estate/tax parcel polygon within each county's parcel dataset. Some counties have polygons for each individual condominium, and others do not. (See Completeness in Section 2 of the metadata for more information.) The points layer includes the same attribute fields as the polygon dataset. The points are intended to provide information in situations where multiple tax parcels are represented by a single polygon. One primary example of this is the condominium, though some counties stacked polygons for condos. Condominiums, by definition, are legally owned as individual, taxed real estate units. Records for condominiums may not show up in the polygon dataset. The points for the point dataset often will be randomly placed or stacked within the parcel polygon with which they are associated.
The polygon layer is broken into individual county shape files. The points layer is provided as both individual county files and as one file for the entire metro area.
In many places a one-to-one relationship does not exist between these parcel polygons or points and the actual buildings or occupancy units that lie within them. There may be many buildings on one parcel and there may be many occupancy units (e.g. apartments, stores or offices) within each building. Additionally, no information exists within this dataset about residents of parcels. Parcel owner and taxpayer information exists for many, but not all counties.
This is a MetroGIS Regionally Endorsed dataset. (See http://www.metrogis.org/data/about/index.shtml#whatis for more information.)
A separate licensed dataset exists for all metro counties. This dataset includes only those counties that have made their data freely available without a license or fees.
Additional information may be available from each county at the links listed below. Also, any questions or comments about suspected errors or omissions in this dataset can be addressed to the contact person at each individual county.
Anoka = http://www.anokacounty.us/315/GIS Dakota = http://www.co.dakota.mn.us/homeproperty/propertymaps/pages/default.aspx

This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington in Minnesota.</supplinf></descript><timeperd><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>20140401</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo><current>See Publication Date</current></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>Quarterly</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-94.012</westbc><eastbc>-92.732</eastbc><northbc>45.415</northbc><southbc>44.471</southbc></bounding></spdom><keywords><place><placekey>Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County</placekey></place><theme><themekey>parcels, regional parcel data, cadastre, land ownership</themekey><themekt>None</themekt></theme></keywords><accconst>None</accconst><useconst>None</useconst><browse><browsen>http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/bg/metrogis_regional_parcels.jpg</browsen><browsed>Sample map showing the MetroGIS Regional Parcel Data.</browsed></browse><crossref><citeinfo><title>Various parcel datasets available at the MetroGIS DataFinder website at http://www.datafinder.org/catalog/index.asp#LandOwnership</title></citeinfo></crossref><native>See Metadata for individual counties.</native><ptcontac><cntinfo><cntperp><cntper>See County website links in the Abstract for individual county contact information</cntper></cntperp></cntinfo></ptcontac></idinfo><dataqual><attracc><attraccr>A standard set of attribute fields is included for each county. However, not all attributes are available for all counties. No attempt has been made by MetroGIS to assess the accuracy of the attribute data.
Additional or missing attributes may be available from local assessors.
Any questions or comments about suspected errors or omissions in this dataset can be addressed to the contact person listed in the individual county metadata. Links to that metadata can be found in the Horizontal Positional Accuracy element below.</attraccr></attracc><logic>No attempt was made to edgematch or rubbersheet the seven counties, thus overlaps and gaps will exist between counties. Not all tax parcels are represented by a unique polygon. For example, a county might have one polygon representing a condominium complex. Some counties have provided an additional parcel points shape file that will include points to represent such tax parcels (e.g. a point for each individual condominium).</logic><complete>For parcel attributes, see Section 5 of this metadata.
Any questions or comments about suspected errors or omissions in this dataset can be addressed to the contact person listed in the individual county metadata.
Inclusion of Condominiums in Polygon Dataset: Some counties include condominium information within their polygon dataset and others do not. Some information on this topic is shown below. Contact each county for further information.
Dakota One polygon is included in the polygon dataset for the geography of the larger common area of a condominium building or complex. Individual condominium units are only represented in the points dataset.
</complete><posacc><horizpa><horizpar>For additional information please visit each counties link below. Anoka = http://www.anokacounty.us/315/GIS Dakota = http://www.co.dakota.mn.us/homeproperty/propertymaps/pages/default.aspx</horizpar></horizpa></posacc><lineage><procstep><procdesc>Each county provided parcel polygons and points with attributes in shape file format with UTM coordinates, to the Metropolitan Council. The Metropolitan Council checked each shape file to insure it had the specified field names, types, lengths and order.
No attempt was made to edgematch or rubber sheet the parcel geography between counties.</procdesc></procstep><srcinfo><srcscale /></srcinfo></lineage></dataqual><spdoinfo><indspref>None</indspref><direct>Vector</direct><mgmg3obj>polygon shapes</mgmg3obj><mgmg3til>Polygons: One shape file for each of the seven counties. Points: One shape file for entire region.</mgmg3til></spdoinfo><eainfo><overview><eaover>A standard set of attribute fields is included for each county. The attributes are identical for the point and polygon datasets. Not all attributes fields are populated by each county.
A list of the attribute names is shown below. Detailed information about the attributes can be found at: http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/MetroGIS_Regional_Parcels_Attributes.pdf
COUNTY_ID: Unique County ID (text 3) PIN: Unique Parcel ID (text 17) BLDG_NUM: House Number (text 10) PREFIX_DIR: Street Prefix Direction (text 2) PREFIXTYPE: Street Prefix Type (text 6) STREETNAME: Street Name (text 40) STREETTYPE: Street Type (text 4) SUFFIX_DIR: Street Suffix Direction (text 2) UNIT_INFO: Unit Information (text 12) CITY: City (actual) (text 30) CITY_USPS: City (mailing) (text 30) ZIP: ZIP Code (text 5) ZIP4: ZIP 4 Extension (text 4) PLAT_NAME: Legal Description Plat Name (text 50) BLOCK: Legal Description Block (text 5) LOT: Legal Description Lot (text 5) ACRES_POLY: Polygon Acreage (numeric 11) (2 dec) ACRES_DEED: Deeded Acreage (numeric 11) (2 dec) USE1_DESC: Use Type 1 (text 100) USE2_DESC: Use Type 2 (text 100) USE3_DESC: Use Type 3 (text 100) USE4_DESC: Use Type 4 (text 100) MULTI_USES: Multiple Uses (text 1) LANDMARK: Landmark/Business Name (text 100) OWNER_NAME: Owner Name (text 50) OWNER_MORE: Additional Owner Name (text 50) OWN_ADD_L1: Owner Address Line 1 (text 40) OWN_ADD_L2: Owner Address Line 2 (text 40) OWN_ADD_L3: Owner Address Line 3 (text 40) TAX_NAME: Taxpayer Name (text 40) TAX_ADD_L1: Taxpayer Address Line 1 (text 40) TAX_ADD_L2: Taxpayer Address Line 2 (text 40) TAX_ADD_L3: Taxpayer Address Line 3 (text 40) HOMESTEAD: Homestead Status (text 1) EMV_LAND: Est. Market Value - Land (numeric 11) EMV_BLDG: Est. Market Value - Buildings (numeric 11) EMV_TOTAL: Est. Market Value - Total (numeric 11) TAX_CAPAC: Tax Capacity (numeric 11) TOTAL_TAX: Total Tax (numeric 11) SPEC_ASSES: Special Assessments (numeric 11) TAX_EXEMPT: Tax Exempt Status (text 1) XUSE1_DESC: Exempt Use 1 (text 100) XUSE2_DESC: Exempt Use 2 (text 100) XUSE3_DESC: Exempt Use 3 (text 100) XUSE4_DESC: Exempt Use 4 (text 100) DWELL_TYPE: Dwelling Type (text 30) HOME_STYLE: Home Style (text 30) FIN_SQ_FT: Square Footage (numeric 11) GARAGE: Garage (text 1) GARAGESQFT: Garage Square Footage (text 11) BASEMENT: Basement (text 1) HEATING: Heating (text 30) COOLING: Cooling (text 30) YEAR_BUILT: Year Built (numeric 4) NUM_UNITS: Number of Units (text 6) SALE_DATE: Last Sales Date (date 8) SALE_VALUE: Last Sales Value (numeric 11) SCHOOL_DST: School District (text 6) WSHD_DIST: Watershed District (text 50) GREEN_ACRE: Green Acres (text 1) OPEN_SPACE: Open Space (text 1) AG_PRESERV: Agricultural Preserve (text 1) AGPRE_ENRD: Ag. Preserve Enrolled (date 8) AGPRE_EXPD: Ag. Preserve Expiration (date 8) PARC_CODE: Parcel Polygon to Parcel Point (numeric 2) and PIN Relationship Code</eaover><eadetcit>A detailed description of the attributes available in this dataset can be found at http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/MetroGIS_Regional_Parcels_Attributes.pdf</eadetcit></overview></eainfo><distinfo><resdesc>MetroGIS Regional Parcels Free Version</resdesc><distliab>ANOKA The information provided on this site is for reference purposes only.
